name: Superman
how_to_perform:
1. Lie face down on a flat exercise mat with your hands under your shoulders and your elbows directly below your shoulders.
2. Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your lower back, keeping your spine in a neutral position.
3. Keeping your elbows close to your body, lift both arms and legs off the ground at the same time, forming an inverted 'V' shape with your body. Hold for a brief moment.
4. Slowly lower your arms and legs back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
5. Repeat the movement in a slow and deliberate manner,
6. Keep your core engaged and your movements controlled.
short_summary: The Superman exercise is an upper body and core strengthener that targets muscles across the chest, shoulders, and back.
